content:
《无人生还》 #Welcome to Urban Outlast, where survival is the only option! In this action-packed 2D battle royale, you are dropped into a vibrant yet perilous island city. Scavenge for resources, equip yourself with weapons and armor, and craft strategic tools to adapt to the ever-shifting battlefield. Outsmart your rivals, make bold moves, and fight to outlast everyone.
Will you be the final survivor in Urban Outlast? The challenge awaits—step into the arena and prove your worth!
下载 #Download 下载链接
说明 #Made as software engineering project. With 3 roommates.
title: Urban Outlast

content:
《仿声人会梦到电子默片吗？》 #Voice Dream is a multiplayer competitive party game. Players will act as voice mimickers, providing amusing sounds for a silent animation by imitating real-life sounds.
这是一款多人竞技声音模仿类游戏。在游戏中玩家将与同伴一起，扮演“仿声人”，通过模仿现实生活中的声音为一部默片动画配上有趣的声响。
The game system will offer professional evaluations and precise feedback on each voice mimicker’s skills. The sounds players can imitate include, but are not limited to: noises made by objects in the scene, animal calls, environmental sound effects, and more.
游戏系统将对每位“仿声人”的业务能力给予专业的评价和精准的反馈。玩家可模仿的声音包括但不限于：场景中物体发出的声音、动物叫声、环境效果音……
What are you waiting for? Grab your friends and start your “voice mimic” career today (it might also be your only step)
还等什么？快拉上你的朋友，开启你们“仿声人”职业生涯的第一步（也可能是唯一一步）吧！
下载与其他平台链接 #Download 下载链接
itch.io
title: Voice Dream
